ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR(leankor__Type__c == "startnoearlierthan", leankor__Type__c == "startnolaterthan", leankor__Type__c == "muststarton", leankor__Type__c == "finishnoearlierthan", leankor__Type__c == "finishnolaterthan", leankor__Type__c == "mustfinishon", leankor__Type__c == "assoonaspossible", leankor__Type__c == "aslateaspossible"), false, true)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Type must be one of the following: startnoearlierthan, startnolaterthan, muststarton, finishnoearlierthan, finishnolaterthan, mustfinishon, assoonaspossible, aslateaspossible.
